attributes.action: Stop partaking in Afghanistan and Libya campaigns and use money for NHS, Police and People of the UK
attributes.additional_details:
Use our forces for the Defence of the UK only and pull out of Afghanistan and Libya, stop being the worlds police force at a time when the people of the UK are being force to accept a drastic cut in their living standards which seem to be funding the UK/USA war mongering on the easy targets of the world who supply oil to Western countries.
Actions to be taken
Pull out of Afghanistan now!
Stopping bombing Libya now!
Use money saved for NHS, police, UK taxpayers and pensioners
